Package com.rattat.micro.game.aster.mvc

Interface Summary
GameListener Defines an interface which objects wishing to observe game events must implement.
ShipListener Defines an interface which objects wishing to observe ship events must implement.
 

Class Summary
GameController This class contains most of the actual logic that controls and updates the model.
Model Defines the model which contains all inforamtion about the state of the game.
ShipController Class for controlling the SpaceShip
View Class which can render a Model to a Graphics object
